overview: Welcome to "Race 2 Race." This interracial sex challenge pits 17 highly skilled men and women of all races, against each other. They've come from around the globe to compete - Africa, Asia, Austria, Australia, and everywhere in between ... Black, White, Yellow, and Red, all vying for the title of "World's Best Fuck." Couples, 3-ways, and 4-ways are "fucking-it-out" to see who's left standing.
tagline: Sex Is A Game... Want To Play?
title: Race 2 Race
